docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Nicaragua has been a disheartening place since its ''beautiful revolution,'' but something stirring might be unfolding there now. Despite a determined effort at intimidation by the ruling Sandinistas, the democratic opposition seems poised to win the Feb. 25 elections over the ruling Sandinistas.

docs.snippet: LEAD: Norton, a 20-pound American alligator; Ramona, a boa constrictor; Bowie, an iguana; and Paki, Holli, Tusa and Oliver, four baby gorillas, were just a few of the animals mingling with 5,600 guests at Lincoln Center Monday night. They were at ...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Norton, a 20-pound American alligator; Ramona, a boa constrictor; Bowie, an iguana; and Paki, Holli, Tusa and Oliver, four baby gorillas, were just a few of the animals mingling with 5,600 guests at Lincoln Center Monday night. They were at the 96th annual meeting of the New York Zoological Society, which included cocktails, films and a report by the society's president, Howard Phipps Jr.

headline.main: Evening Hours;   Lincoln Center Has Zoo Night, Styne a Duet
